Maciej Beręsewicz and Robert Pater presented the paper "Multilingual hierarchical classification of job advertisements for job vacancy statistics" during online meeting of the [International Partnership on Automatic Job Coding](https://www.ipajc.com/about-us) on August 1st, 2025. 

Presentation can be found [here](./2025_IPAJC_seminar.pdf).
